p: To evaluate the model performance, we used the threshold‐independent area under the receiver operating characteristic curve (AUC) with value ranges from 0 to 1. AUC values close to 1 indicate perfect model agreement (Phillips et al., 2006). Variable importance was estimated by the permutation importance method (Searcy & Shaffer, 2016). The logistic results of the MaxEnt model were considered to represent the probabilities of species occurrence (Phillips & Dudík, 2008). We then reclassified the results into presence and absence using the average of the maximum training sensitivity plus specificity (Liu, Berry, Dawson, & Pearson, 2005; Songer, Delion, Biggs, & Huang, 2012). Areas with probability values above the threshold were regarded as suitable habitats.
